page.title: 08A DAY IN MY LIFE
page.content: AGED 1O+, MOST OF MY DAYS ARE SPENT AT SCHOOL. I GET UP AY 8.OO A.M. AND HAVE A BREAKFAST OF CEREALS. THEN I WASH AND SET OFF FOR SCHOOL AT 8.4O A.M. MY SCHOOL IS WORSBROUGH BANK END PRIMARY AND I AM IN THE OLDEST JUNIOR CLASS. IT WAS OPENED ABOUT 2O YEARS AGO BUT I HAVE ONLY BEEN ATTENDING FOR ABOUT 15 MONTHS , OUR FAMILY MOVING INTO THE AREA FROM CUNDY CROSS. AFTER THE REGISTER WE BEGIN LESSONS WHICH INCLUDE TOPICS, SINGING, PHYSICAL ED., READING, MATHS, ENGLISH, GAMES, SWIMMING AND R.E. I LIKE SWIMMING BUT I DON'T LIKE MATHS BECAUSE I ALWAYS GET "SEE ME" ON MY WORK. AT PLAYTIME I JOIN IN THE FOOTBALL ON THE YARD. ITS A ROUGH GAME BUT WE ENJOY IT. SCHOOL DINNERS ARE 5OP. AND SCHOOL CLOSES AT 3.45 P.M. WHEN HOME I GET MY BIKE OUT, PLAY WITH FRIENDS OR WATCH TELEVISION AND BEDTIME IS AT ABOUT 1O P.M.
